lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: My life is so blessed. I cannot ever know how difficult life must be in a developing country compared to living in the US.  Here we can turn on a light switch and pretty much be guarenteed that we will have light, we can pretty much gaurentee that when we drive to a grocerie store, we can get food, we can flush, we can shower, and we take it for granted. To complain about almost ANYTHING in the US, is to not appreciate how hard the rest of the world has it.

There were times when someone would unexpectedly help me and it brought such a feeling of hope and relief.  I would like to give that feeling to someone else!

lenders.occupational_info:
We created  Claybourg International, LLC to bring to the US market beautiful and rare traditional clay cookware from Alsace, France.

Our 100% handcrafted and hand-painted clay cookware make French cooking easy, healthy and great tasting.  We provide free healthy traditional French cuisine recipes.
